item.title: Combine Dies with Under 400 Hours
item.description: A farm combine fails in under 400 hours of use, highlighting equipment issues, maintenance lessons, and the challenges of managing heavy machinery.

item.description: A lighthearted moment featuring Dougo’s humor, sharing laughs and showcasing the fun side of farm life through his jokes and playful personality.

item.description: A farm machine part comes detached, creating a tricky situation, highlighting problem-solving, teamwork, and practical solutions for equipment issues.

item.title: New CAT Tractor Arrives on Site
item.description: A brand-new CAT tractor is delivered to the farm, showcasing equipment setup, features, and the excitement of adding powerful machinery to daily operations.
